DzBulgeBinding Class Reference
[Object and Geometry Classes]

A class that specifies the weight maps and scalar values for an individual bulge binding. More...

#include <dzbulgebinding.h>

Detailed Description

A class that specifies the weight maps and scalar values for an individual bulge binding.

Member Function Documentation

int DzBulgeBinding::getAxis (  )  const
Returns:
The axis of rotation that the bulge is applied on: 0 for X, 1 for Y or 2 for Z.
void DzBulgeBinding::getBulgeValues ( float &  posLeft,
float &  posRight,
float &  negLeft,
float &  negRight,
bool  defaultVal = false 
) const

Sets the given parameters to the bulge scalar values of this binding.

Parameters:
posLeft Set to the scalar for positive rotation using the left weight map.
posRight Set to the scalar for positive rotation using the right weight map.
negLeft Set to the scalar for negative rotation using the left weight map.
negRight Set to the scalar for negative rotation using the right weight map.
setAsDefault If true, the given parameters are set to the default values, if false, the given parameters are set to the current values.
DzWeightMap * DzBulgeBinding::getLeftWeights (  )  const
Returns:
The left weight map for the bulge binding, or NULL if none.
float DzBulgeBinding::getNegLeftBulge ( bool  defaultVal = false  )  const
Parameters:
defaultVal If true, the default value is returned, if false, the current value is returned.
Returns:
The value of the bulge scalar for negative rotation using the left weight map.
DzFloatProperty * DzBulgeBinding::getNegLeftBulgeController (  )  const
Returns:
A pointer to the property that controls the bulge scalar for negative rotation using the left weight map.

Parameters:

void DzBulgeBinding::setAxis ( int  axis  ) 

Sets the axis of rotation that the bulge is applied on.

Parameters:
axis 0 for X, 1 for Y, 2 for Z.
void DzBulgeBinding::setBulgeValues ( float  posLeft,
float  posRight,
float  negLeft,
float  negRight,
bool  setAsDefault = false 
)

Sets the value of the bulge scalar controls.

Parameters:
posLeft The scalar for positive rotation using the left weight map.
posRight The scalar for positive rotation using the right weight map.
negLeft The scalar for negative rotation using the left weight map.
negRight The scalar for negative rotation using the right weight map.
setAsDefault If true, the given values become the default values, if false, the given values become the current values.
DzError DzBulgeBinding::setLeftWeights ( DzWeightMap *  map  ) 

Sets the left weight map for the bulge binding.

Parameters:
map The new left weight map for the bulge, or NULL to clear the left weight map.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
void DzBulgeBinding::setNegLeftBulge ( float  val,
bool  setAsDefault = false 
) [slot]

Sets the scalar for negative rotation using the left weight map.

Parameters:
val The value to set the scalar to.
setAsDefault If true, the given value becomes the default value, if false, the given value becomes the current value.
void DzBulgeBinding::setNegRightBulge ( float  val,
bool  setAsDefault = false 
) [slot]

Sets the scalar for negative rotation using the right weight map.

Parameters:
val The value to set the scalar to.
setAsDefault If true, the given value becomes the default value, if false, the given value becomes the current value.
void DzBulgeBinding::setPointer ( const DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID,
short  pointerID,
DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework when reading a native file. Reimplemented from DzElement. This method will be called with the sectionID and pointerID that were given when writing the file out. The passed pointer may be shared so should not be deleted.

Parameters:
file The file being loaded
sectionID The ID of the file section being read
pointerID The ID of the pointer being read.
ptr The pointer being read.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

bool  setAsDefault = false 
) [slot]

Sets the scalar for positive rotation using the left weight map.

Parameters:

setAsDefault If true, the given value becomes the default value, if false, the given value becomes the current value.
void DzBulgeBinding::setPosRightBulge ( float  val,
bool  setAsDefault = false 
) [slot]

setAsDefault If true, the given value becomes the default value, if false, the given value becomes the current value.
DzError DzBulgeBinding::setRightWeights ( DzWeightMap *  map  ) 

Sets the right weight map for the bulge binding.

Parameters:
map The new right weight map for the bulge, or NULL to clear the right weight map.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
void DzBulgeBinding::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path). Reimplemented from DzElement.

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
